defaultPosition.title: Deportation Officer

positions.title: Deportation Officer

positions.description:
Provides supervision, care and correctional treatment of inmates. Maintenance of institution security contributing to the health and welfare of the inmates and the promotion of good public relations.

Enforces rules and regulations governing facility security, inmate accountability and inmate conduct to ensure judicial sanctions are carried out and inmates remain in custody. From time to time, may be authorized to carry firearms and to use physical force, including deadly force, to maintain control of inmates.
positions.title: Correctional Officer

positions.description: Maintain order. Escort to and from medical appointments. Property officer, intake officer. Operated central control.
